Posts.EditableText: Why do you make the fifth one cost money?  I know its really powerful but only a few people like me play text games or make them.
Posts.HTML: Why do you make the fifth one cost money?  I know its really powerful but only a few people like me play text games or make them.

Posts.EditableText: Quest used to be paid software, but the 5th incarnation is both free and open-source. Alex has also released the full version of Quest 4.1.4 as freeware, although the source code will not be released for earlier versions.
Posts.HTML: Quest used to be paid software, but the 5th incarnation is both free and open-source. Alex has also released the full version of Quest 4.1.4 as freeware, although the source code will not be released for earlier versions.

Posts.EditableText: Ohh you can download quest 5 for free?
Posts.HTML: Ohh you can download quest 5 for free?

Posts.EditableText: Only a technical preview is available at the moment, but you can find it here: http://quest5.net/
